埰字的基本解释

埰
cǎi
坟墓。

埰
cài
古同“采”，古代卿大夫的食邑。

埰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cǎi］
［《廣韻》倉代切，去代，清。］
古代卿大夫的食邑。
[②]［cài］
［《集韻》此宰切，上海，清。］
坟墓。

埰字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　埰； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页230第43
【廣韻】【集韻】?倉代切，音菜。埰地也。　又【集韻】此宰切，音採。【揚子·方言】冢，或謂之埰。【郭璞註】古者卿大夫有采地，死葬之，因名。【正字通】采官也。因官食地，故曰采地。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [Tu Zi Department] 　 Cai; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 230, 43
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Cangdai cut, sound dishes. The land is also collected.　[Jiyun] This is a cut, sound collection. [Yangtze Dialect] Tomb, or Zhicai. [Guo Pu's Note] The ancient doctor Qing had collected the land and was buried in death by name. 【Zhengzitong】Caiguan also. Because of the official food land, it is called mining land.
